title: 2001 - Fall: The Price of Silence - Daniel Baldwin, Michael Madsen - Someone is going down.

sources.title: 2001 - Fall: The Price of Silence - Daniel Baldwin, Michael Madsen - Someone is going down.
sources.description:
When silence comes with a price, one man must choose between loyalty and survival.
Professional thief Jeremy Banes turns state's evidence against his Mafia boss Joseph King and enters the witness protection program with FBI agent Keith Taylor.  but soon discovers that staying silent comes with deadly consequences.

Original Title: Fall (2001) | AKA: Fall: The Price of Silence, The FBI vs. the Mafia
